law.catch_line: Traps illegally set or used -- Seizure or treatment as contraband.
law.text: Any trap set, used, or maintained in violation of the provisions of KRS 150.400 or 150.410 shall be subject to confiscation as contraband under the provisions of KRS 150.120, except that any trap set, used, or maintained without the tag required by subsection (1) of KRS 150.410 is hereby declared contraband and shall be so treated without any order of court so declaring.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 353, sec. 6, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 53, effective June 19, 1952. - Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 3.
